original_title: Helloween ft. Kai Hansen: Rock in Rio 2013
overview: Power Metal lovers also had their place in the past "Rock In Rio" held in Brazil. That's why we leave the presentation of HELLOWEEN Germans, who also had the pleasure to invite on stage to an old friend, Kai Hansen. Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 22, 2013. The setlist that evening was:     01. Eagle Fly Free  02. Where the Sinners Go  03. Waiting for the Thunder  04. I'm Alive  05. Live Now!  06. If I Could Fly  07. Power  08. Are You Metal?  09. Dr. Stein (with Kai Hansen)  10. Future World (with Kai Hansen)  11. I Want Out (with Kai Hansen)
tagline: helloween kai hansen rock in rio
title: Helloween ft. Kai Hansen: Rock in Rio 2013
